name: Fatima Ahmed
description: Fatima and her family run a small farm living in a low-lying region of Bangladesh, where she helps cultivate crops to support her family.

name: Diego Gonzalez
description: Diego comes from a long line of fishermen who have relied on the ocean to support his family and maintain his traditional way of life.

name: Amina Saidi
description: Amina runs a small bakery in her village 300km from Mogadishu. She has built her business over several years and needs her income to feed and put her 3 young children through school.

name: Javier Ramirez
description: Javier spent his whole life in the city, he fought in the Korean War and has struggled with his mental health.

name: David Jones
description: David is a 3rd generation dairy farmer running their medium size holding in Wales. They have around 300 cows.

name: Elahee Hafiz
description: (cast your mind back to 2010) Elahee is a preccocious 6 year old who likes to play with the animals on her family farm.
